description:
More than just a style piece, Timberland’s Original Chukkas are sustainably made with LWG certified leather and materials that contains at least 50% recycled plastic. To date Timberland has re-purposed more 445 metric tons of plastic waste in their products.Uppers are leather from a tannery rated Silver or higher by The Leather Working Group. Tanneries are assessed based on energy use, waste production and water treatment.Liners made from ReBOTL recycled  fabric that wick moisture away from the foot.Removeable anti-fatigue footbeds.Aggressive tread helps keep you anchored.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather














                      Recycled content
name: Timberland Originals Chukka Boots - Men's
